content.en: Cryptographic advancements: Researchers have proposed improvements to Harn's digital signature for Diffie-Hellman public keys, while the Korean cryptographic community, in collaboration with government-supported agencies, has developed a certificate-based digital signature algorithm. Other studies explore topics such as integrating Diffie-Hellman key exchange into the Digital Signature Algorithm, achieving multiparty DSA signature generation without simultaneous user operations, and designing short signatures without random oracles. However, the agency of the algorithms in these studies is not specified.
content.da: Kryptografiske fremskridt: Forskere har foreslået forbedringer til Harns digitale signatur for Diffie-Hellman offentlige nøgler, mens det koreanske kryptografiske samfund, i samarbejde med regeringsstøttede agenturer, har udviklet en certifikatbaseret digital signaturalgoritme. Andre studier udforsker emner såsom integration af Diffie-Hellman nøgleudveksling i den digitale signaturalgoritme, opnåelse af multiparts DSA signaturgenerering uden samtidige brugeroperationer, og design af korte signaturer uden tilfældige orakler. Dog er agenturet for algoritmerne i disse studier ikke specificeret.
